reviews.text: We stay at a lot of HGI for work and we got what we come to expect in Elko, NV. Staff very courteous and helpful. Grounds and rooms very clean. Nice lounging area in the lobby. We didn't eat at the restaurant at this particular HGI, but they are usually quite good.
reviews.title: As Always - great stay at HGI

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent one night in a one-bedroom suite, and it was everything a person wants while on a road trip. The AC was quiet, the drapes made our room black, everything was very clean, and our breakfast was great. We will definitely stay here next time we are in Elko!
reviews.title: Quiet, dark, clean, spacious!

reviews.text: From the hotels I stayed in Elko thus far, this is best value for your money period! Relatively new, spacious room, clean, friendly staff and surprisingly the Fitness Room had free weights and more than your regular 10'x 10'. More importantly, no gambling machines anywhere in sight. Have stayed there before.
reviews.title: Great Value!

reviews.text: Thank You
reviews.title: Good value and location.

reviews.text: The staff was very pleasant and efficient. The room was clean, quiet and comfortable. Good location away from casinos. We've stayed here a few years ago and it has only gotten better. The Wifi, a little hard to get to, and flat screens are a nice addition. The towels and shower curtain could be upgraded. The breakfast was simple, but good, served quickly and efficiently.
reviews.title: Waitress in grill was outstanding!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Second time staying here. Great Hotel, excellent rooms. Our new go to place in Elko. Have not tried the restaurant becuse we ara always headed to the Star Hotel for dinner. Use to stay at Holiday Inn Express until they went 100% Non Smoking.
reviews.title: Great Place and Value

reviews.text: A totaling satisfying experience with one caveat being the speed of the internet connection. A lack of full service restaurant was not a problem since enough of a variety was provided. The other amenities were on par with the other hotels in the area.
reviews.title: Elko Experience

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for one night on a business trip. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. The overall appearance of the hotel was excellent. All areas were very clean. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Hilton Garden In n Elko NV

reviews.text: Why would anyone want to stay anywhere but The Hilton Garden Inn. The accommodations are clean & comfortable, the hotel staff is pleasant & helpful, the restaurant serves amazing food & the wait staff is kind & customer-oriented. The Hilton Garden Inn makes your travel experience a one-stop experience, you never have to leave the hotel because everything you need is right at your fingertips. Why stay anywhere else?
reviews.title: Why stay anywhere else?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely place, helpful staff, great breakfast, comfy bed, clean room. We were on a road trip and I booked the room on my I phone while hubby drove. I read tons of reviews on every Elko NV hotel I could find online. We made the right choice. We had a great stay!
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.text: This is one of the nicer hotels in Elko and I stay heree every year during the Cowboy Poetry Gathering and aksi when I attend other events in the town. For the second time in three years, I reserved a suite, which was confirmed by email, and arrived to be told no suites were available without any good reason offered.
reviews.title: Good hotel in Elko, but reservations not always accurate

reviews.text: I have stayed there several times now and always had pleasant experiences. The place is bright and functional with large labels on everything to find your way around. Decent breakfast. Probably one of the nicer places in town so no real complaints and the big flatscreens in the rooms were a nice touch. Would stay there again!
reviews.title: Generally pleasant

reviews.text: We stayed here as we driving through Elko. The property was in good condition, the rooms were very nice, beds, small microwave, mini refrigerator, desk and chair, tv and another chair. The beds were full, not queens and think queens would have been more comfortable. W had dinner and breakfast in their restaurant. The breakfast was very good and included in out room price. The dinner service was a little slow, but after a long day of driving it was better than going out and searching for someplace to eat and we appreciated that they had peanut butter and jelly on the menu for kids. All the staff we encountered was very pleasant. We would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice, clean place to stay.

reviews.text: I had the experience of being a couple of days at the Hilton in elko nv .. was pleasant to me quipin hause quipin service of very cleaned my room nice and the girl was very nice and respectful I think his name is elia, or elvia ..:) .. was a very nice experiensa we should value more hause quipin work ...!!!!
reviews.title: room service

reviews.text: recommend this hotel
reviews.title: Nice Ovenight

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel on a road trip and were quite happy with the hotel. It is on the edge of town and looks to be fairly new. Everything was spotlessly clean and well cared for. The beds were comfortable and the hotel is quiet - exactly what we needed. The staff was friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: If you need to stay in Elko, this is the place

reviews.text: It is a bit of a walk (approx 3/4 mile) to a couple of casinos and restaurants, but definitely walkable - good sidewalks all the way. It is also close to a gas station and grocery store, which makes it easy to fill up/stock up for the next day of a road trip.
reviews.title: Not Hot Water at 6:00 AM Really

reviews.text: I arose in plenty of time to get to a 7:00 am apointment only to find no hot water. I called the front desk. They knew about the issue and maintenance was looking in to it. No offer of follow up " I will let you know an update as soon as I know" No offer of compensation for a prepaid room, No follow up by manager, they didn't even log my room number I bet!
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.text: This hotel is a fantastic find. We stay here with our two children. The breakfast is fantastic, the staff are very curtious, the pool and the exercise room is well taken care of. We order room service for dinner because honestly it has some of the best food available in the area and you don't have to wait to be seated and you can dine in the peace and quiet of your room.
reviews.title: Secure, quiet, clean place to stay in Elko NV

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hilton Garden Inn is one of the best hotels in Elko NV. Unlike the cheaper options, you do not get contractors stomping around in their boots in the room overhead at 4AM, and you don't have the cigarette smell in the lobby that goes with the casino crowd. The rooms are secure and you are far enough out of town to avoid traffic noise.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel
